Paysley: Title

Access Key
This is the access key, received from Paysley developer portal. ( required )
Enable Logging
Enable transaction logging for Paysley.

Paysley: How to execute a Full Refund?
How to execute a Partial Refund?
On administration panel go to menu : Sales > Orders
"Paysley": "På administrationspanelet gå til menu: Salg > Ordrer"

Paysley: Select the transaction that you want to refund
Click invoice menu on the left side
Click the invoice data on the right side
Click on Credit memo
Then click the refund button
On administration panel go to menu : Sales > Orders
"Paysley": "På administrationspanelet gå til menu: Salg > Ordrer"

Paysley: Select the transaction that you want to refund
Click invoice menu on the left side
Click the invoice data on the right side
Click on Credit memo
Choose the product quantity that you want to refund at Qty to Refund column
Click the Update Qty’s button
Input Refund Shipping, Adjustment Refund, Adjustment Fee
Then click the refund button
